price: 45. Kaši bakokaki komitelemisa te, mpe bamilongisaki te.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
